name: nafu
tagline: Be prompt. Never shirk. Make promptness a habit.
body:
# Who am I?

### Personal Description

* **Free Spirit**
* Software engineer
* My major is mechanical engineering

### Languages

* Japanese (native)
* English (intermediate)

### OS

* Ubuntu
* CentOS
* FreeBSD
* Windows (rarely)
* Mac OS (most often)

### Programming Languages

* R
* C++
* PHP
* Java
* Ruby
* Python
* Javascript
* Objective-C

So far, PHP is the longest experience

### Shell

* zsh

### Typing Speed

![TypeRacer.com scorecard for user nafu](http://data.typeracer.com/misc/badge?user=nafu)

### Tools

* Vim
* Coda
* Fireworks
* Solidworks
* Sublime Text 2

### Interests

* Playing soccer
* Watching movies
* Listening music
* Technology
  * Robots
  * Machine learning
  * Artificial intelligence

### Philosophy

* *Be positive!*

### Music

* Rock, Jazz, Punk, Electronic, Pop.
* When I'm studying, I often listen Classical.
* When I'm programming, I often listen 80's music such as Red Hot Chili Peppers, U2, Bon Jovi, Queen, Elton John, Stevie Wonder, Chicago, Tears for Fears, Elvis Costello, KISS, Eric Clapton.

### Movies

* Broken Blade
* Mr&Mrs Smith
* **Summer Wars**
* The Social Network
* Mission Impossible 
* The Shawshank Redemption

### Books

* Joel on Software
* the Night time Picnic
* The Art of Readable Code
* The Passionate Programmer
* Machine Learning for Hackers
* Seven Languages in Seven Weeks
* New Programmer's Survival Manual
* The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People

### Favorite website

* [TED](http://www.ted.com)
* [verbling](https://www.verbling.com)
* [Meepup](http://www.meetup.com)
* [italki.com](http://www.italki.com)
* [Hacker News](http://news.ycombinator.com)
* [LOLCATS.COM](http://www.lolcats.com)
* Of course, [GitHub](http://github.com)
